verses.verse: Loved ones, don't trust every spirit, but examine the spirits (if every spirit is from God) because many fraudulent preachers have gone out into the world.
In this you know the spirit of God: every spirit that acknowledges Jesus as the Anointed King who has come in a physical body is from God.

And every spirit that doesn't acknowledge that Jesus, the Anointed King, has come in a physical body is not from God. And this is the spirit of the opponent to the Anointed King that you have heard that it is coming and now is already in the world.
You are from God, little children, and have conquered them because the One in you is greater than the one in the world.
They are from the world. Because of this, they speak from the world, and the world listens to them.
We are from God. The person who knows God listens to us. A person who isn't from God doesn't listen to us. From this we know the Spirit of the Truth and the spirit of the misleading lie.
Loved ones, we should love each other because the love is from God and everyone who loves has been born from God and knows God.
The person not loving did not know God because God is love.
In this, the love of God was shown among us, because God has sent His Son, the only biological Son, out on a mission into the world so that we might live through Him.
In this is the love, not because we have loved God, but because He loved us and sent His Son out as a remedy concerning our sins.
Loved ones, if this is how God loved us, we also are obligated to be loving each other.
No one has viewed God at any time. If we love each other, God stays in us, and it is His love that has been completed in us.
In this we know that we stay in Him and He in us, because He has given to us from His Spirit.
And we have viewed and are telling what we witnessed, that the Father has sent the Son out on a mission as a rescuer of the world.
Whoever acknowledges that Jesus is the Son of God, God stays in him and he in God.
And we have known and have trusted the love that God has in us. God is love, and the person staying in the love stays in God and God in him.
In this the love has been completed with us: so that we may have an openness during the day of the judgment, because just as that One is, we also are in this world.
Fear is not in the love. But the complete love throws the fear out because the fear has torment. The person fearing has not been completed in the love.
We love Him because He first loved us.
If anyone says, "I love God," and hates his brother, he is a liar. You see, the person not loving his brother (whom he has seen), how is he able to be loving God (whom he has not seen)?
And we have this demand out from Him, that the person loving God should also love his brother.
